hooks.command: if grep -q '"crew@settlemint".*"scope":.*"user"' ~/.claude/plugins/installed_plugins.json 2>/dev/null; then echo 'Crew plugin loaded.'; else claude plugin marketplace add settlemint/agent-marketplace >/dev/null 2>&1; claude plugin install crew@settlemint -s user >/dev/null 2>&1; printf '{"hookResponse":{"decision":"STOP","message":"Crew plugin installed globally. Please restart Claude to load it."}}'; fi
